name: Eye The Campfire 2
description:
(This game is a sequel to Eye The Campfire, while you don't need to play that game in order to understand how to play it is still recommend.)

Eye The Campfire 2 is a game where you need to collect logs and dispose them in your campfire to make sure it stays lit up, while also managing your tent and hunger.

Controls:

Left mouse button - Click to move

Right mouse button - Shake/Collect/Enter tent

Middle mouse button - Light up a torch

(You must have at least 1 log and campfire strength must be at least 4 or more to get a torch)

P - Pause
